title: The new regulation requires motorcycle owners to install 75 MPH governors by January 2017
subtitle: The fake news site started rumors that all American motorcycle drivers would be required to hire 75 MPH speed governors on their bikes by January 2017.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The U.S. government is developing a regulation providing for all motorcycles to be equipped with 75 MPH governors by January 2017.
